name: com.unity.lego.materials
description: A complete library of all past and current LEGO Materials used in the physical sets.

upm.changelog: ### Changed,- Updated the project to URP including all material assets,- Minimum compatible version changed to 2021.2.7f1,- Moved some colours to legacy,- Moved some public APIs to be internal,### Added,- Added new LEGO colours,- Added option to show legacy colours in the colour picker,- Added a highlight in the colour picker to show which colour is currently selected,- Added documentation to public APIs that were missing documentation
